short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sustainability isn't just about the big things, like what vehicle you buy, it's also the small choices we make every day

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Most of us are generally up for saving environment, working towards greener future. But many don't know how each one of us can contribute to the same. Sustainable living is not just about big things like buying a $100k ModelS, it is about the choices we make everyday. EVeryday choices and small habits can lead towards saving tons of money in the long run and also keeping the surrounding clean and green. 

This extension aims to guide to through various everyday activities that can lead to a sustainable living in a minimally invasive manner. You will get a tip everyday which you can read and if you agree, absorb in your everyday routine. WIthin a year you will notice you bank balance depleting at a slower rate that before.
